shopping_cart_widget.widget.json: {"name":"ShoppingCartWidget","description":"Displays a cart with a list of articles, lets the user add or delete some and order them.","version":{"spec":"0.1.0"},"integration":{"type":"angular"},"compatibility":["json-patch"],"features":{"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#","type":"object","required":["cart","article"],"properties":{"cart":{"type":"object","description":"The shopping cart with articles.","required":["resource"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the data resource with articles of the cart.","format":"topic"},"order":{"type":"object","description":"Reset the cart.","properties":{"required":["action"],"button":{"type":"object","description":"A button to perform the order.","properties":{"htmlLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label of the button.","default":"Order"}}},"action":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the action to perform the order.","format":"topic"}}}}},"display":{"type":"object","description":"Display the articles of the shopping cart in a table.","properties":{"headline":{"type":"string","description":"Title of the item list.","default":"Shopping Cart"},"htmlNameLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label for the article name.","default":"Article"},"htmlIdLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label for the article id.","default":"Art. ID"},"htmlPriceLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label for the article price.","default":"Price"},"htmlQuantityLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label for the quantity of articles.","default":"Quantity"},"htmlSumLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label for the subtotal of all items.","default":"Subtotal"},"htmlAddItemLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label for the button to add the article again.","default":""},"htmlDeleteItemLabel":{"type":"string","description":"Label for the button to delete one item of the article.","default":""},"htmlNoItemsText":{"type":"string","description":"A hint if the cart is empty.","default":"The cart is empty"},"htmlOrderedCartText":{"type":"string","description":"A hint that the order was performed.","default":"Articles ordered!"},"htmlOrderedCartErrorText":{"type":"string","description":"A hint that a error occurred when trying to order.","default":"Could not order Articles. Try again later."}}},"article":{"type":"object","description":"The selected article","required":["resource","onActions"],"properties":{"resource":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the data resource with the selected article.","format":"topic"},"onActions":{"type":"array","description":"Add article to cart.","items":{"type":"string","format":"topic"}}}}}}}
